mapper.insert: INSERT INTO attendance (att_no, att_date, att_time, leave_time, status, u_id, subject_id) VALUES (seq_att_no.NEXTVAL, #{attDate}, null, null, '휴가', #{userId}, #{subjectId})

INSERT INTO sub_attendance (sub_att_no, sub_att_time, sub_leave_time, u_id, att_no, content, sub_attendance_title, sub_att_date, sub_status) VALUES (sub_seq_att_no.NEXTVAL, #{subAttTime}, #{subleaveTime}, #{userId}, #{attNo}, #{content}, #{subAttendanceTitle}, sysdate, #{subStatus})

INSERT INTO SUB_ATT_FILE (SA_FILE_ID, SA_FILE_NAME, SA_FILE_SIZE, SA_FILE_CONTENT_TYPE, SA_FILE_DATA, SUB_ATT_NO) VALUES (SEQ_SA_FILE_ID.NEXTVAL, #{saFileId}, #{saFileSize}, #{saFileContentType}, #{saFileData}, #{subAttNo})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(sub_att_no) AS COUNT FROM sub_attendance sub, attendance a, users u WHERE sub.att_no = a.att_no AND a.u_id = u.u_id AND u.u_id = #{userId}

SELECT rownum, SUB_ATT_NO as "subAttNo", SUB_ATTENDANCE_TITLE as "subAttendanceTitle", SUB_ATT_TIME as "subAttTime", SUB_ATT_DATE as "subAttDate", SUB_STATUS as "subStatus", RESULT as "result", U_ID as "userId", U_NAME as "userName" FROM( SELECT rownum as rnum, SUB_ATT_NO , SUB_ATTENDANCE_TITLE , SUB_ATT_TIME , SUB_ATT_DATE, SUB_STATUS , RESULT , U_ID, U_NAME FROM( SELECT SUB_ATT_NO , SUB_ATTENDANCE_TITLE , SUB_ATT_TIME , SUB_ATT_DATE, SUB_STATUS , RESULT , U_ID, U_NAME FROM( SELECT SUB_ATT_NO , SUB_ATTENDANCE_TITLE , SUB_ATT_TIME , SUB_ATT_DATE, SUB_STATUS , RESULT , s.u_id as U_ID, U_NAME FROM sub_attendance s, USERS u WHERE s.u_id = u.u_id AND s.u_id = #{userId} ) order by sub_att_date desc ) where rownum <= #{end} ) where rnum >= #{start}
